SMB Server Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added SMBServer2 service to indicate the following action now requires authentication:
  • GetSMBServerSettings
  • GetSMBFolders

Services

SMBServer

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SMBServer
This service provides access to a device's SMB folders.

Service Actions

  • CreateSMBFolder
  • DeleteSMBFolder
  • EditSMBFolder
  • GetSMBFolders
  • GetSMBServerSettings
  • SetSMBServerSettings

SMBServer2

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SMBServer2
This service provides access to a device's SMB folders.

Service Actions

  • CreateSMBFolder
  • DeleteSMBFolder
  • EditSMBFolder
  • GetSMBFolders
  • GetSMBServerSettings
  • SetSMBServerSettings

Actions

CreateSMBFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateSMBFolder
This action creates a new SMB folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the SMB folder. This value must be unique. This value must be between 1 and 22 characters long and may only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the SMB folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the SMB folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the SMB folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the SMB folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateSMBFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
ErrorFolderExists An SMB folder with the specified name already exists.
ErrorInvalidName The specified name is invalid.
ErrorPathDoesNotExist The specified path does not exist.
ErrorTooManyFolders The SMB folder cannot be created because the maximum number of SMB folders has already been reached.
ErrorUnknownGroup One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
ErrorUnknownPartition The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateSMBFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff",
  "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
  "path": "/",
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "groupsWithPermission": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

DeleteSMBFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteSMBFolder
This action deletes a SMB folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the SMB folder.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteSMBFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnknownFolder The specified SMB folder does not exist.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteSMBFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

EditSMBFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditSMBFolder
This action edits information about a SMB folder on the device.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the SMB folder.
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the SMB folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the SMB folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the SMB folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the SMB folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditSMBFolderResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
ErrorPathDoesNotExist The specified path does not exist.
ErrorUnknownFolder The specified SMB folder does not exist.
ErrorUnknownGroup One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
ErrorUnknownPartition The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditSMBFolder"

{
  "name": "my stuff",
  "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
  "path": "/",
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "groupsWithPermission": [
    "example string"
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

GetSMBFolders

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBFolders
This action gets a list of the device's SMB folders. Folder names returned by this method are not guaranteed to be unique. This is to allow for detection of share name collisions due to external forces, such as a user inserting two USB drives configured with colliding share names.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
smbFolders SharedFolder[] no The list of SMB folders.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBFoldersResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBFolders"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "smbFolders": [
      {
        "name": "My Music",
        "partitionName": "/dev/sdb1",
        "path": "/",
        "pathExists": true,
        "isReadOnly": false,
        "groupsWithPermission": [
          "example string"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetSMBServerSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBServerSettings
This service provides access to a device's SMB folders. This action gets the device's SMB server settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
workgroup string no The workgroup name.
isAnonymousWriteEnabled bool no Whether anonymous users can write to shared folders.
maxSMBFolders int yes A platform-specific limit on the number of SMB shared folders. If this value is not present, there is no limit on the number of SMB shared folders.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBServerSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetSMBServerSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "workgroup": "Workgroup",
    "isAnonymousWriteEnabled": true,
    "maxSMBFolders": 123
  }
}

SetSMBServerSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetSMBServerSettings
This action sets the device's SMB server settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
workgroup string no The workgroup name. The workgroup name must be between 1 and 15 characters long and can only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).
isAnonymousWriteEnabled bool no Whether anonymous users can write to SMB folders.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetSMBServerSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidWorkgroup The workgroup name is not valid.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetSMBServerSettings"

{
  "workgroup": "Workgroup",
  "isAnonymousWriteEnabled": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

SharedFolder

http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SharedFolder
Information about and current settings of a shared folder.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no The name of the shared folder.
partitionName string no The name of the partition on which the shared folder resides.
path string no The path to the directory that corresponds to the shared folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.
pathExists bool no Whether the path exists on the partition.
isReadOnly bool no Whether the shared folder is read-only.
groupsWithPermission string[] no The list of groups that have permission to access the shared folder.
